snippet.title: Pinball Kingdom: Tower Defense
snippet.description:
Download Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.TwoyansLLC.PinBallKingdom


Pinball Kingdom this is a combo of popular arcade game and the Tower Defense.
You know the rules! Use your flippers to destroy enemy buildings and defense your kingdom. 
You play like a regular pinball, but the goal is different. You must defend your kingdom against a pinball ball and destroy enemy buildings using the same ball.
The Pinball Kingdom game starts with a very simple kingdom, but you can upgrade it to become a very defensive one.
In Pinball Kingdom season one, players play versus humans, but in season two we plan to add Orcs, Monsters, new bosses with skills, more kingdoms, and balls with passive effects.

Why you’ll love Pinball Kingdom:
- Straightforward two-button control
- Intuitive gameplay
- Good combo from 2 generations
- Boss Levels
- Surprise chests
- A great time killer whenever you need it!
- No annoying Ads


Video Music by: Benjamin Tissot (Dubstep)
https://www.bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/dubstep
